name: Star Sonata II
description: Star Sonata II follows in the footsteps of it's predecessor. With a completely redesigned class system, thousands of new missions, expanded game content, Star Sonata II brings us a massively updated universe, ready to explore! Players can trade, explore, build and battle like never before! Factions within the games are controlled by players, allowing for a dynamic empire building game play. What's more, players worthy enough can even vie for universal dominance to achieve the coveted title of Emperor! Playing Star Sonata II is completely free, though subscribers get access to end game content and a few little extras here and there. Have you got what it takes to conquer the universe?
